title: Gold and Silver Jump to Record Highs on Greenland Tariff Threats
description: Gold and silver jumped to record highs as President Donald Trump’s intensifying push to take Greenland spurred fears of a damaging trade war between the US and Europe.
content: Gold and silver jumped to record highs as President Donald Trump’s intensifying push to take Greenland spurred fears of a damaging trade war between the US and Europe.
